record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL MONDAY, JANUARY 22, 2007, AT 1 P.M.

speaking.paragraph: Madam President, if there is no further business to come before the Senate, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate stand adjourned under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 9:35 p.m., adjourned until Monday, January 22, 2007, at 1 p.m.
